scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min && npm run build:js
scripts.build:css: sass src/assets/scss/frontend.scss assets/css/frontend.css --load-path=node_modules && sass src/assets/scss/admin.scss assets/css/admin.css --load-path=node_modules
scripts.build:css:min: sass src/assets/scss/frontend.scss assets/css/frontend.min.css --style=compressed --no-source-map --load-path=node_modules && sass src/assets/scss/admin.scss assets/css/admin.min.css --style=compressed --no-source-map --load-path=node_modules
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run build:zip
